website_summaries.verdict: A high-performance motorcycle battery sold at a competitive price.
pros: Spill-proof with no water checks required
Economical pricing makes the battery a great option for street-cruisers, ATVs, street-touring motorcycles, and street motor scooters
cons: Inferior cranking amps in contrast to comparable motorcycle batteries

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for 2004 yamaha r6
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for 2004 yamaha r6. Only annoying flaw is the nut required to screw in connections. I dropped the sneaky little brat in between the chassis and battery so if you're not a butterfinger like me you're golden. I'll update my review in a year and see if it survives a buffalo winter with a trickle charger.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Land

customer_reviews.title: Battery went bad in the warrenty period
customer_reviews.text: battery went bad in the warranty period , it will not take a charge at all. I cannot find a link to have it replaced under warranty. Very convenient for the seller my loss their gain
customer_reviews.author: c8512

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT fit 2007 r6
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE: This item does not fit 07 r6 as listed AND there are NO REFUNDS. I am giving this 5 stars due to the stellar customer service I received and not for any feature of the battery (which I'm sure is fine by the way) as it simply did not fit despite measuring, as well as being listed as fitting in the description AND through Amazons fitment guide.
customer_reviews.author: zichik

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great battery for the price. Came charged and ready to use, fit perfectly into my Yamaha Raptor 700. Too early to tell how long it will last but I do charges on my batteries every week or so by rotating my charger between my toys. I'd love to get another shorai battery but this is 1/5 of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Goldash

customer_reviews.title: Will not fit a 2007 YZF-R6
customer_reviews.text: Product will NOT fit a 2007 YZF-R6.... might fit a 05 and under and the R6s series.. 4 stars because I was refunded my money but still have to wait for another battery
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One powerful little battery for our home generator and priced right too.
customer_reviews.author: 4 N ER

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a new battery
customer_reviews.text: Just installed the battery on the 06’ raptor 700, changed the oil, the plug, emptied the old gas, added fresh 91 gasoline, and she fired right up. I’ll update this review later down the road. Otherwise, great price and quick shipping. Can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap battery option
customer_reviews.text: I am not confident about how long this battery will last on a motorcycle that is weekend driven, but it has held up fine for less than a year so far.
customer_reviews.author: J. Li

customer_reviews.title: High recommend this battery
customer_reviews.text: Awesome battery!! exactly like picture and my son really enjoying his Powerwheel again and thank you high recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: if they last 3 or 4 years I will be satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: bought 2 of these for my scooters, if they last 3 or 4 years I will be satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: James E Zastawniak

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Battery died in five months. Won’t charge. No link or number found anywhere to replace per the 1 year warranty!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace battery for sons moped. Worked for less than two weeks before it failed to start / run the moped
customer_reviews.author: terrence oslizlo

customer_reviews.title: Works on 2004 Yamaha R6
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for battery replacement on 2004 Yamaha R6. Worked as advertised! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Kai Pan

customer_reviews.title: Arrived  on time
customer_reviews.text: Needed a battery for my moped for a reasonable price . As for longevity and durability ? That remains to be seen .
customer_reviews.author: Tinker in MarylandAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is for my electric start generator
customer_reviews.text: Great little battery, not only for a motor cycle, but for a generator.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Steele

product_meta.title: ExpertPower YT9B-BS 12v8ah lead_acid_battery
